creator: gtanner@gmail.com
text:
Now that we have moved to Apache we should update the BlackBerry repo [1] to be a pointer to our Apache resources.

Best bet would be to force push a README.md and get rid of all the code / history.

README.md would reference the ripple site [2] as well as the git repo [3] and a small blurb about the project moving to Apache.

[1] https://github.com/blackberry/Ripple-UI/
[2] http://ripple.incubator.apache.org/#
[3] https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=incubator-ripple.git;a=summary
